statements: UPDATE threat_intelligence_feeds SET feed_source='ExampleFeed1', indicator_type='IP Address' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE threat_intelligence_feeds SET indicator_value = 'malware' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE threat_intelligence_feeds SET feed_source = 'Symantec', indicator_type = 'IP Address' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE threat_intelligence_feeds SET feed_description='Updated Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE security_analytics SET threat_level=2, source_ip='192.168.1.10' WHERE event_id=1001;
UPDATE threat_intelligence_feeds SET feed_description = 'Updated Feed Description' , feed_url = 'https://newfeedurl.com' , feed_name = 'Updated Feed Name' WHERE id = 1 ;
UPDATE security_analytics SET threat_level = 5 , timestamp = '2023-11-30 14:30:00' , source_ip = '192.168.1.100' WHERE event_id = 500 ;
UPDATE ThreatIntelligenceFeeds SET feed_name = 'New Feed Name' WHERE feed_id = 1;
UPDATE Indicators SET indicator_type = 'IP' WHERE indicator_id = 3;
UPDATE ThreatIntelligenceFeeds SET feed_name='New Feed Name', feed_description='Updated feed description' WHERE feed_id=1;

UPDATE threat_feeds SET feed_name = 'New Feed Name' WHERE feed_id = 1;
UPDATE indicators SET indicator_value = 'New Value', indicator_type = 'New Type' WHERE indicator_id = 1;
UPDATE threat_feeds SET feed_name='New Name', last_updated=NOW() WHERE feed_id=1;
UPDATE incidents SET incident_name='Updated Incident', incident_date='2022-09-15' WHERE incident_id=3;
UPDATE threat_intel_feed SET last_updated = '2022-01-15' WHERE feed_name = 'Malware Feed'
UPDATE threat_indicators SET indicator_type = 'IP Address', indicator_value = '192.168.1.1' WHERE related_feed_id = 1
UPDATE threat_intel_feed SET feed_name='New Feed Name', last_updated='2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Malware Attack', related_indicator_id=5 WHERE event_id=100;
